      • setApkDir

        public void setApkDir(java.lang.String apkDir)
        Customizing the directory for storing the APK files or DEX files. The name list of APK files under this directory will be detected by RAPID.
        Parameters:
        apkDir - the string of the full path.

      • processSingleFile

      • setUnzippedFileDir

        public void setUnzippedFileDir(java.lang.String unzippedFileDir)
        If it is necessary for the user to create another directory to store the temporary DEX file while it is being processed, this method can set the directory
        Parameters:
        unzippedFileDir - The string for the full path of the directory

      • getApkList

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery(com.unh.unhcfreg.QueryBlock queryBlock)
        Call back method where RAPID can receive the APIs called by user. User has to call this method and implement the interface of 'QueryBlock' as the parameter,
        Parameters:
        queryBlock - the implementation of interface 'QueryBlock', The function 'queries()'of the interface should be override as a APIs container.

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.MethodElement> getMethodInvolker(dataComponent.MethodElement method)
        Obtaining all the methods that have called a assigned method.
        Parameters:
        method - An instance of class 'MethodElement'.
        Returns:

      • isMethodExist

        public boolean isMethodExist(dataComponent.MethodElement method)
        Returning true or false for the existence of a certain method in DEX file, which FULLY compares the attributes: 'className', 'methodName', and 'parameterType[]',which are the 3 essential conditions for affirming an independent method.
        Parameters:
        method - Target method object.

      • searchSimilarMethod

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.MethodElement> searchSimilarMethod(dataComponent.MethodElement method)
        Searching similar method(s) with the parameter Comparing the attributes: 'className', 'methodName', and 'parameterType[]' maximum. It is not going to be check, If an attributes is NUll. If all attributes are NULL, the return is the whole list of methods.
        Returns:
        Returning the method list with non-NULL value attributes matched.

        Return True if the assigned string can fully match a string in DEX file
        Returns:
        boolean value

      • stringContaines

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.StringElement> stringContaines(java.lang.String keyword)

        Returns:
        Array list of eligible string object(s).

      • getMethodList

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.MethodElement> getMethodList()
        Obtaining the whole list of methods in a DEX file, which includes methods having a definition in DEX file and methods only invoked in DEX file, which is also considered as APIs in RAPID
        Returns:
        the array list of 'MethodElement' instances

      • getStringList

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.StringElement> getStringList()
        Obtaining the while list of strings in a DEX file 'String' objects here represent all strings that exist in the application, e.g., values in string variables, method or class names, function return values etc.
        Returns:
        the array list of 'StringElement' instances

      • getApiList

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.MethodElement> getApiList()
        Obtaining the list of all utilized APIs in a DEX file Term 'API' in RAPID is represented by all the methods utilized in a DEX file without definition and code block.
        Returns:
        the array list containing the 'MethodElement' instances of the eligible methods

      • searchInstruction

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.Instruction> searchInstruction(java.lang.String opcode,
                                                               long operand)
        Searching certain instructions by matching its opcode and the operand. The return value can be NULL when there is no matching instructions.
        Returns:
        The eligible instructions

      • searchInstruction

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.Instruction> searchInstruction(java.lang.String opcode)
        Searching certain instructions by only checking its opcode The return value can be NULL when there is no matching instructions.

      • searchInstructions

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.Instruction> searchInstructions(dataComponent.Instruction[] targetIns)
        Obtaining instructions through searching a Instruction list. Fields 'opcode' and 'operand' are checked maximum if the value of them is not NULL. The return value can be NULL when there is no matching instructions.

      • getInstructionsOfExternalFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<dataComponent.Instruction> getInstructionsOfExternalFiles()
        Search instructions invoking external files (JAR, DEX or SO). Back trace the the path of the external files If it exist in DEX file statically
        Returns:
        return the instruction(s) where the APIs below is invoked in DEX file. java.lang.System.load(..) java.lang.System.loadLibrary(..) dalvik.system.DexClassLoader.DexClassLoader(..) dalvik.system.PathClassLoader.PathClassLoader(..)

      • getExternalFilesDirectory

        public boolean areExternalFilesLoad()
        Search instructions invoking external files
        Returns:
        Return TRUE
